Posts.Content: I have had 3 lumps removed and none of them showed up on any tests my dr did. My dr and I both dont want to take any chances so we opt to have them removed as I am in a high risk range for breast cancer. I have found a new lump and we are watching it for now but it will come out also. I think all breast lumps belong in a JAR no in my breast's... Brenda
Posts.Title: question about breast ultrasound
